front.title: Definition of Textual Conventions and BJECT-IDENTITIES for Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Management

abstract.t: This memo describes Textual Conventions and OBJECT- IDENTITIES common to the Management Information Bases (MIBs) for managing Generalized Multiprotocol Label It supplements [TCMIB] which describes Textual Conventions and OBJECT-IDENTITIES common to the Management Information Bases (MIBs) for managing Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) networks.
